primarySegments.name: Urban Young Professionals
primarySegments.description: Young professionals living in urban areas who rely on convenient transportation for their daily commute and social activities.

behaviors: Frequent app users, especially during peak hours
Preference for economy or mid-tier service levels
Engage with app features like ride tracking and payment options

primarySegments.name: Suburban Families
primarySegments.description: Families living in suburban areas who use the service for family outings and travel to urban centers.

psychographics: Budget-conscious but willing to pay for quality
problemsNeeds: Need for safe and reliable transportation for family outings
Desire to avoid parking hassles in urban areas
behaviors: Use app mainly on weekends and holidays
Preference for mid-tier and larger vehicles
Occasional use of luxury service for special occasions

primarySegments.name: Business Travelers
primarySegments.description: Professionals who travel frequently for work and require reliable transportation to and from airports and meetings.

problemsNeeds: Need for reliable and timely airport transfers
Desire for professional and comfortable rides
Require easy expense tracking for business trips
behaviors: Frequent use of app for airport and business travel
Preference for luxury or premium service levels
High engagement with app for scheduling and payment tracking

excludedSegments.name: Rural Residents
excludedSegments.reason: Rural areas have limited demand for ride-sharing services due to lower population density and greater reliance on personal vehicles for transportation.

excludedSegments.name: Low-Income Individuals
excludedSegments.reason: This segment may find the cost of ride-sharing services prohibitive and may not have access to the necessary technology or payment methods to use the app effectively.
